concept.title: Case 6: Roaming day pass with bucket of usage

section.title: Overview
section.p: Bob has a device with Prepaid pass for roaming data consumption from the monetary bucket. The roaming pass is configured to expire within 24 hours from purchase. The rate for roaming data consumption is based on the location. A threshold level is applied on the monetary bucket.

If the data consumption from the monetary data bucket exceeds the threshold level, then an email is sent to Bob on his roaming device indicating that incremental charges will be applied for further data consumption.

ul.li: Bob has a device associated with a Prepaid monetary data bucket for roaming data consumption.
A threshold level is applied on the monetary data bucket.

Bob has started usage with:
MCCMNC equal to CANADA
MCCMNC equal to Mexico
MCCMNC equal to US
MCCMNC equal to ROW

Verify that if data consumption from the monetary data bucket exceeds the threshold level, then an email is sent to Bob on his roaming device indicating that incremental charges will be applied for further data consumption.

section.title: Provisioning

note.p: Ensure that after creating a record, you distribute it to ME. Otherwise, the provisioning will not be successful.

section.p:
Following entities are required for this use case. Entities for case 6
Entity Task
Notification preferences Select the notification channel as email.
Notification templates Create a notification template and add the text to be sent in an email notification.
Notification servers Configure a notification server to send an email notification.
Thresholds Create an absolute type threshold with Send-Notification action.
Rates Create different rates for zones.
Charging Services
Create a charging service with the following details:
Bucket: Create a roaming day pass bucket.
Tariff: Create a tariff formula to apply different rates based on the zone in which Bob initiates a data call.
Lifecycles Create a subscription (DayPass subscription, DayPass subscription renewal), account, and device lifecycles.
Bundles Create a bundle and associate it with the subscription lifecycles.
Rules and Variables Create a rule variable for roaming status.
Mapping Tables Create the mapping for zones, MCC_MNC to Zone-Name mapping.
Accounts Create an account and associate with an account lifecycle.
Devices Create a device and associate with a bundle and device lifecycle.
